name: trending_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v2.
Tool description: Youtube API for search, videos, channels, trending, recommendation
API description: Fetches a list of trending YouTube videos based on the given parameters.

country.description: The country code for which to retrieve trending videos. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code for the video titles and descriptions. Defaults to 'en'.

section.description: The section of trending videos to retrieve. Possible values are "Now", "Music", "Movies", "Gaming". Defaults to 'Now'.
